schema.name: Healthyfied Beef Bellpepper Bolognaise

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the bell pepper under cold water, then dice it into small pieces.
In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
Add the diced bell pepper to the skillet and sauté for about 5 minutes until slightly softened.
Increase the heat to medium-high and add the beef to the skillet. Cook for about 10 minutes, breaking it apart with a spatula until browned.
Season the beef and bell pepper mixture with salt, white pepper, thyme, basil, marjoram, and black pepper. Stir well to combine.
Pour in the water and add the bolognese sauce to the skillet. Stir to combine and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and let it simmer for about 20 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld.
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Serve hot.

schema.description: This Healthyfied Beef Bellpepper Bolognaise brings a high-protein and low-carb delight to your table, perfect for health enthusiasts looking for low-sugar yet flavorful options. Each bite is an infusion of healthy and healthified ingredients designed to nourish your body and tantalize your taste buds with a blend of fresh herbs and robust flavors.
